name: reinsert
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to put something back into or inside something else: I had to remove and reinsert the battery to get the thing to work. She reinserted her contact lenses after she had cleaned them. Related words
insert
reinsertion
More examplesFewer examplesYou might try ejecting the disk and re-inserting it into the computer.I want to reinsert a bit of common sense into politics.Place them back on the tray and re-insert them into the oven until they are fully cooked.Remove the thermometer and reinsert it when the mixture has hardened.
